description:
When water or showers are a far-away luxury, these soft wipes are the next best thing. Soothing aloe and vitamin E formula is pH balanced, easy on your skin and doesn’t require rinsing.

  • Super-soft viscose material is compostable (but please carry them out if you're in the wilderness) and stands up to stubble
  • Contains 8 wipes. Compact are: 16 x 20cm, extra large are: 20 x 30cm
  • Resealable package keeps them from drying out
name: Sea To Summit Wilderness Wipes
